[MY PREVIOUS ACTION - Turn 63]
Reasoning: Let me analyze the current situation:

**Current State:**
- I'm in a STANDARD_PACK phase
- I need to choose 1 of 3 playing cards to add to my deck
- Current Money: $19
- I have 5 jokers (at max capacity)

**Booster Pack Choices:**
1. 8 of Clubs - +8 chips, Earns $3 when played and scores
2. 5 of Diamonds - +5 chips (basic card)
3. 6 of Spades - +6 chips, Wild Card (can be used as any suit), Creates a Planet card for final played poker hand of round if held in hand

**Current Jokers:**
1. Zany Joker - +12 Mult for Three of a Kind
2. Sock and Buskin - Retriggers face cards
3. Wrathful Joker - +3 Mult per spade scored
4. Business Card - Money from face cards
5. Abstract Joker - +15 Mult constant

**Analysis:**

Option 1: **8 of Clubs** - +8 chips, Earns $3 when played and scores
- This is a decent card that generates money
- But I already have $19 and money isn't my main constraint
- The +8 chips is decent but not exceptional

Option 2: **5 of Diamonds** - +5 chips
- This is just a basic card with no special abilities
- Not particularly useful

Option 3: **6 of Spades** - +6 chips, Wild Card, Creates Planet card if held in hand
- This is VERY valuable! It's a Wild Card (can be used as any suit)
- More importantly, it creates a Planet card for the final played poker hand if held in hand
- This means I can level up my most-played hand types (Three of a Kind) for FREE at the end of each round
- It's also a Spade, which synergizes with Wrathful Joker (+3 Mult per spade scored)


- The chip value is lower than the 8 of Clubs, but the utility far outweighs that tradeoff. The 6 of Spades gives me a Wild Card for hand flexibility and generates free Planet cards each round to continuously upgrade Three of a Kind, which directly supports my core strategy. Plus it triggers Wrathful Joker for bonus Mult. Position 3 is the clear winner.

# Available Commands
The possible commands in Balatro are all composed of a single word specifying the action, followed by any necessary positional arguments, which are lists of integers.
Note: all position arguments are 1-indexed.

The following commands are available in your current game state.
use_consumable <consumeable_position> <target_card_position1> <target_card_position2> ... <target_card_positionN> - Use a consumeable from the consumeables section. The first position argument is the position within your consumables inventory of the consumable you'd like to use. Subsequent position arguments specify the cards in hand that the consumeable will be used on, if that consumeable requires targets.
sell_consumable <consumeable_position> - Sell a consumeable from the consumeables section.
rearrange_jokers <joker1> <joker2> ... <jokerN> - Rearrange the list of currently owned jokers. Every index in the list of current jokers must be present, i.e. if there are 5 jokers, the indices 1-5 must be present.
sell_joker <joker_position> - Sell a joker from the jokers section.
buy_card <card_position> - Buy a card from the card section. Individual Joker cards are also bought from the card section.
buy_booster <booster_pack_position> - Buy a booster pack from the booster pack section.
buy_voucher <voucher_position> - Buy a voucher from the voucher section.
buy_and_use_consumable <consumable_position> - Buy a consumable type card (Tarot, Planet, Spectral) from the card section and use it immediately. Cannot do this if the consumable requires target hand cards.
round_select - Finish shopping and go to the round select screen.
reroll_shop - Spends the reroll cost to reroll the cards section of the shop.

2. Sock and Buskin - Retriggers face cards

**Why Turtle Bean is valuable:**
- +5 hand size is extremely powerful - it gives me 13 cards instead of 8
- More cards means more options for forming hands
- Even though it degrades by 1 each round, it will still provide value for multiple rounds

3. Wrathful Joker - +3 Mult per spade scored
4. Abstract Joker - +15 Mult (will go back up to +15 when I have 5 jokers)

This creates a solid joker lineup with the hand size boost helping me form better hands. Once I acquire Turtle Bean, there's nothing else to purchase, so I'll move forward to the next round.
